name: Tridek - Creatures of Galena: Digital Trading Card Game
blurb: We are raising funds to expand Tridek and release it on all digital platforms! With customization and cross platform multiplayer.

rewards.reward: Supporter:  Not only do you receive our heartfelt thanks but you will get all news of the project before anyone else! Plus access to the closed Beta Forum so you can follow the project from development to completion.

Late Beta Backer:  You will receive a special Thank You video from the full Tridek Team as well wallpapers for use on your Desktop/Tablet/Mobile Devices.  You will also be listed in the credits as a backer so everyone knows you are a member of our team!  Plus you will receive Phase 2 Beta Access and everything above!  Yet wait you get more!  When the game is live you will receive free booster packs worth $10.

Early Beta Backer:  Special listing the the credits to highlight your donation and membership of team Tridek. Exclusive video interviews with the team as well as Phase 1 Beta Access.  You will also receive exclusive Digital Concept Art, the digital soundtrack, and a glimpse into the lore and story behind Tridek. \r\nPlus all the rewards listed above. Plus when the game is live you will receive free booster packs worth $20.

Alpha Backer:  The first tier to have access to the Alpha version of Tridek and help from the start to have a guiding hand in the game.  Plus you will receive all of the awards listed above.  This tier will receive free booster packs worth $30.
Well Dressed Backer:  Will receive the limited edition T-Shirt, be invited to a live panel session to discuss the game and its direction via Google+, plus all the rewards from Alpha Backer and above!

Artistic Backer: This tier is the first to get the limited edition soundtrack on CD signed by our composer.   Plus a limited edition concept artwork signed by the artist that can easily be hung on your wall and everything from the Alpha Backer and above!
Styling Backer:  Will get the limited edition Tridek Hoodie!  Plus everything Alpha Backer and above receive as well a question and answer session with the development team.

Prototype Backer:  You will get to choose one of the original prototype cards from Tridek signed by the designer himself!  These cards will never be given out or re-produced again.  Plus all rewards from Alpha Backer and above!

Creature Backer:  Design a creature!  You will get to form an idea and have a creature take form plus your name on the card as the designer of that creature!  Also you get Alpha Backer rewards and above!

Intelligent Backer:  Design an AI Opponent in the Game!  You can choose a name, the background story and card deck that one of the AI opponents will use in the single player tournaments.  Plus you will receive all of the Alpha Backer rewards and above.

Inspired Backer:  You will get to come to Germany and stay 2 days in the city of Munich.  While here you will have the chance to meet the full Tridek Team, have your questions answered and also get a signed prototype card.  You will also find out what it takes to go from a physical prototype to a digital format.  Later you can relax with the team and learn the game from those who made it.\r\n                           \r\n(Please note: You are responsible for your own travel expenses.)

Historic Backer:  With such massive support you will receive a 5 day holiday in the cities of Munich and Regensburg.  While meeting the team and learning about the development of Tridek you will also have the chance to see the attractions around our beautiful cities.  You will also be receiving all rewards listed above as well as be included in a video update from the Tridek Team to further recognize your commitment.  (Please note:  You are responsible for your own travel expenses.)
